name: creative-studio-saas
description: A comprehensive SaaS platform for creative professionals in Egypt.

scripts.build: rimraf dist && mkdir dist && esbuild index.tsx --bundle --outfile=dist/bundle.js --jsx=automatic --loader:.ts=tsx --format=esm --minify --define:process.env.SUPABASE_URL='"'$SUPABASE_URL'"' --define:process.env.SUPABASE_ANON_KEY='"'$SUPABASE_ANON_KEY'"' && cp index.html styles.css favicon.svg dist/
